heroTitle.heroDescription: I develop modern web solutions by integrating design, logic, and external services to bring impactful projects to life.

aboutMe.heading: I turn complexity into digital simplicity, with an approach that blends modern design and exceptional performance. Developing isn’t just my job — it’s my passion.
aboutMe.title: ABOUT ME
aboutMe.paragraph1: I specialize in building dynamic, responsive websites, with great attention to detail to deliver smooth and engaging user experiences.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I love working with the latest technologies and turning ideas into digital reality. I enjoy exploring new design trends and constantly improving my skills.

servicesDescription: From idea to execution, I turn visions into digital solutions.
landingPagesDescription: Conversion-focused landing pages tailored to your business.
designsDescription: Visuals that leave a lasting impression.
mernDescription: Full-stack applications built with MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.
